Package marytts.exceptions

Exception Summary
ExecutionException A special type of expected error conditions This class represents error conditions for external scripts such as Exceptions at runtime when processing fails
MaryConfigurationException A class representing severe expected error conditions, such as wrong format of data files needed to set up the system.
NoSuchPropertyException  
SynthesisException
